description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Distributed File System (DFS) remote code execution vulnerability (CVE-2024-29066):

1. Install the KB-5036896 update released on April 9, 2024.
2. Restart your system after installation to apply the changes.

**Details**:
- This update resolves a remote code execution vulnerability in the Windows DFS, which could allow an attacker to gain all resources within the impacted component.
- Ensure that you have administrative privileges to install this update.
- Backup critical data before proceeding to avoid any potential data loss.

For more detailed installation steps, see the official guide at: https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2024-29066.
